lead_paragraph: Much of the improvement in profit came from continuing cuts to the bank’s expenses and work force.

headline.print_headline: Cost-Cutting Helps Lift Profit 10% at JPMorgan Chase
headline.main: JPMorgan Chase’s Cost-Cutting Helps Lift Profit 10%

snippet: Much of the improvement in profit came from continuing cuts to the bank’s expenses and work force.
abstract: JPMorgan Chase reports fourth-quarter profit of $5.4 billion, or $1.32 a share, up 10 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue rose 1 percent to $23.75 billion.
